definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"

sentences.english: Shen Weijing says it will not take minister of north Korea to peace.
sentences.chinese: 沈惟敬表示不会带朝鲜大臣去议和。

sentences.english: We concluded an agreement with the enemy and soon made peace.
sentences.chinese: 我们同敌军签订了一项协议，不久就议和了。

sentences.english: The leaders of the two nations decided to make peace.

definition: to dispatch an army/to send troops
to enlist enemy or rebel soldiers by offering amnesty/to bring to negotiated surrender
to form an alliance/to ally oneself with/allied with/aligned/to bond with
to take to the field oneself (of emperor)/to take part in person in an expedition
the emperor leads his troops into battle (idiom)/to take part personally in an expedition
